column5: more than 100 Cambodians were captured by the Thai army after illegally crossing the border in Sampov Loun district.------Lieutenant Colonel Keo Doeun
column6: chief of the Border Police Battalion No. 1317
column7: said that more than 100 Cambodians were repatriated
column9: four children.------They are now being quarantined at Sampov Loun High School for testing for COVID-19 test
column10: under the guidance of the provincial leaders and the Battambang Provincial Health Department.------AREY
